title: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed
notes: May need to verify with Epic account before launch. Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Some tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**. Needs C++ runtime.
description: An all-ages take on its brand of four-versus-one asymmetric multiplayer games, where you play as your own original Ghostbusters team â€” or take on the role of a ghost hellbent on wreaking haunted havoc.
